channel.title: How to make your own server?
channel.description: [glow=red,2,300]hello, if want to log in there almost allways stand that the server must be down. how do i make my own server?? plz help me im dutch so i do not understand everthing ;)[/glow]

item.title: How to make your own server?
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Helper Mopar Helper
item.description:
@Mopar_Helper wrote:

ok go on your hamachi, and click the triangle in corner,
then click ‘join an existing network’ then go on to the advertisement for that server, type in the name of there network and the pass then go on moparscape and type the port and ip.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make your own server?
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Helper Mopar Helper
item.description:
@Mopar_Helper wrote:

ok,
you need a source which is on the downloads page, i reccomend testscape, then you need java, www.javsun.com,
and when you try to get on servers do you try to get on 127.0.0.1? because ones with numbers lie 5.97.103.165 (fake) you need hamachi, www.hamachi.cc
open your source, click runserver then open your hamachi and put whatever is on that into the (IP At top) to the server part and the port will be included on runserver.

Read full topic
